content.question: Part B (i) ​Use the given data to find the average rate of change of the number of units of the video game sold, in thousands per day, from <math alttext="t equals 0"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </math> to <math alttext="t equals 91"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>91</mn> </math> days.
